attributes.action: To Recognise The state of PALESTINE immediately.
attributes.additional_details: As the nation that has historically caused the predicament we find this region of the world is in it is the duty of this nation to rectify this historical error.
attributes.background: For the UK government to recognize the state of Palestine immediately and to afford it, all the legal provisions and requirements of a recognised state. To uphold all UN conventions and resolutions that will help to facilitate this new recognised state.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653509
